segments.text: Can you give me more details on what is included in the package ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . The coach leaves at 6:30 a . m . , in front of our office . The drive takes eight hours , with two stops to see some sights .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'll be staying at Holiday Inn . It's a three-star hotel with two restaurants and a swimming pool .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . What types of things will we do at Lushun Falls ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The second day you take a four-hour city tour . In the afternoon you go on the famous boat cruise under the falls .
segments.speaker: S2
